europeana:record.dc:title: The family Haleciidae (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa) from the Strait of Gibraltar and nearby areas
Zoologische Mededelingen

Haleciidae
Strait of Gibraltar
geographical distribution
europeana:record.dc:description: A faunistic study of the family Haleciidae from the Strait of Gibraltar and nearby areas has been made; seven species are described, figured and discussed. Information about the zoogeographical distribution, and conditions of substrates are contributed. A key to distinguish the species of this family from the seas of the Iberian Peninsula is presented, and the Iberian Haleciidae are compared with those from the Mediterranean and the British Isles.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The family Haleciidae (Cnidaria: Hydrozoa) from the Strait of Gibraltar and nearby areas (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 72, 1-10)
